languages.text: "Нет, ничуть не жалею. Служба на флоте почетна, но только под началом Леди Теодоры я по-настоящему ощутил… значимость того, что делаю".
"No, I do not regret it in the least. Serving in the Imperial Navy is a fine thing to do, but it was only under Lady Theodora that I truly felt the significance of what I was doing."
languages.original_text: "Нет, ничуть не жалею. Служба на флоте почетна, но только под началом Леди Теодоры я по-настоящему ощутил… значимость того, что делаю".

traits.locale_text: "No, I do not regret it in the least. Serving in the Navy is a fine thing to do, but it was only under Lady Theodora that I truly felt the significance of what I was doing."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No, I do not regret it in the least. Serving in the Navy is a fine thing to do, but it was only under Lady Theodora that I truly felt the significance of what I was doing."

languages.text: “不，我从未后悔过。在帝国海军服役固然很好，但只有随侍在西奥多拉夫人身边时，我才能真正感受到工作的意义。”
languages.original_text: "No, I do not regret it in the least. Serving in the Imperial Navy is a fine thing to do, but it was only under Lady Theodora that I truly felt the significance of what I was doing."

traits.locale_text: “不，我从未后悔过。在海军服役固然很好，但只有随侍在西奥多拉夫人身边，我才能真正感受到工作的意义。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Non, pas le moins du monde. Servir dans la Marine Impériale est un grand honneur, mais ce n'est que sous les ordres de dame Théodora que j'ai trouvé un sens à ma vie. »
languages.original_text: "No, I do not regret it in the least. Serving in the Imperial Navy is a fine thing to do, but it was only under Lady Theodora that I truly felt the significance of what I was doing."

traits.locale_text: « Non, pas le moins du monde. Servir dans la Marine est un grand honneur, mais ce n'est que sous les ordres de dame Théodora que j'ai trouvé un sens à ma vie. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Nein, ich bereue es nicht im Mindesten. In der imperialen Kriegsflotte zu dienen, ist eine edle Sache, gewiss. Doch erst unter Lady Theodora habe ich wirklich gespürt, wie bedeutsam es ist, was ich tue."
languages.original_text: "No, I do not regret it in the least. Serving in the Imperial Navy is a fine thing to do, but it was only under Lady Theodora that I truly felt the significance of what I was doing."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, ich bereue es nicht im Mindestens. In der Flotte zu dienen, ist eine edle Sache, gewiss. Doch erst unter Lady Theodora habe ich wirklich gespürt, wie bedeutsam es ist, was ich tue."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「いや、少なくとも私は後悔していない。帝国海軍で働くことは素晴らしいこと。しかし、自分がしていることの意義を本当に感じたのはレディ・シオドーラの元でのことだった」
languages.original_text: "No, I do not regret it in the least. Serving in the Imperial Navy is a fine thing to do, but it was only under Lady Theodora that I truly felt the significance of what I was doing."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、少なくとも私は後悔していない。海軍で働くことは素晴らしいこと。しかし、自分がしていることの意義を本当に感じたのはレディ・シオドーラの元でのことだった」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «En absoluto. Servir en la Armada Imperial es una labor noble, pero hasta que estuve al servicio de lady Theodora no fui plenamente consciente de la importancia de mi labor».
languages.original_text: "No, I do not regret it in the least. Serving in the Imperial Navy is a fine thing to do, but it was only under Lady Theodora that I truly felt the significance of what I was doing."

traits.locale_text: «En absoluto. Servir en la Armada es una labor noble, pero hasta que estuve al servicio de lady Theodora no fui plenamente consciente de la importancia de mi labor».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "No, I do not regret it in the least. Serving in the Imperial Navy is a fine thing to do, but it was only under Lady Theodora that I truly felt the significance of what I was doing."

languages.text: "Hayır, en ufak bir pişmanlık duymadım. İmparatorluk Donanması'nda görev yapmak iyiydi hoştu lakin önemli bir şey yaptığımı asıl Leydi Theodora'ya çalışırken hissettim."
languages.original_text: "No, I do not regret it in the least. Serving in the Imperial Navy is a fine thing to do, but it was only under Lady Theodora that I truly felt the significance of what I was doing."
